concept.title: Quick start
concept.shortdesc: Follow these instructions to download and install the tutorial application.

conbody.p: This quick start will help you to set up the code and just follow along as you read through the rest of the tutorial.

li.p: Download Couchbase Server and install it. Make sure to install the beer-sample bucket when you run the wizard because this tutorial application works with it.
Clone the repository and install dependencies (Express and Jade):
li.codeblock: $ git clone git://github.com/couchbaselabs/beersample-node Cloning into 'beersample-node' #... $ cd beersample-node $ npm install
$ node beer.js Server running at http://127.0.0.1:1337/

li.p: In your web browser, navigate to http://localhost:1337/welcome, and enjoy the application!
